apple_vendor_description: As rendered on Apple devices, this emoji beautifully illustrates a couple, one with a dark skin tone and the other with a medium skin tone, unified by a vibrant red heart floating between them. Appleâ€™s smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a sense of depth and warmth, emphasizing the loving bond. The gentle curves and soft edges of the figures and the heart evoke a feeling of partnership, romance, and deep affection.
